entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 60
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
